plot: The new anomaly detector detects an anomaly in the River Thames, where Abby is taken by one of the creatures. As tensions rise amongst the team, Cutter and Connor set out to rescue Abby.

An anomaly under water unleashes a creature that might be a much-evolved shark from the future; but killing it doesn't end the problem, since at least one other creature is lurking in the depths, and takes Abby while she is on a boat looking for the thing. This sets off more tension in the team as Connor blames Nick for abandoning the search for Abby and Steven thinks they are looking in the wrong place.—Ron Kerrigan <mvg@whidbey.com>
